description:
reversion:2011.3~d4~20110802.1360-0ubuntu0ppa1~natty1

root@cloud001:/var/log/nova# nova-manage service list
cloud001   nova-scheduler enabled  :-) 2011-08-03 04:53:45
com001     nova-compute enabled  XXX 2011-08-03 02:19:47
cloud001   nova-network enabled  :-) 2011-08-03 04:53:45
cloud001   nova-compute enabled  XXX None


======nova-compute.log======
DEBUG nova [-] Creating Consumer connection for Service compute from (pid=12073) start /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/nova/service.py:154
DEBUG nova.rpc [-] Initing the Adapter Consumer for compute from (pid=12073) __init__ /usr/lib/pymodules/python2.7/nova/rpc/amqp.py:180
2011-08-03 12:58:30,118 ERROR nova.rpc [-] AMQP server on 172.16.4.184:5672 is unreachable: [Errno 111] ECONNREFUSED. Trying again in 10 seconds.
ERROR nova.rpc [-] AMQP server on 172.16.4.184:5672 is unreachable: [Errno 111] ECONNREFUSED. Trying again in 10 seconds.
ERROR nova.rpc [-] AMQP server on 172.16.4.184:5672 is unreachable: [Errno 111] ECONNREFUSED. Trying again in 10 seconds.
title: nova-compute failed to connect Rabbit-MQ server

comments.content:
Sorry for this report. 
I found that rabbit-mq server should be restart.

It's already resolved.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tonytkdk
